text: Arau te'omlokara babe'o, yisakale muhajirasakalara agamanara agate e'i nagaraika nibasa hicape grahana karaiche arau imana aniche, te'omloke te'omlokara ocarata hijarata karai aha manuhabilakaka bhalapaya arau muhajirasakalaka yi diya haiche tara babe te'omloke nija antarata kono hinsa posana nakarae, arau te'omloke abhara thaka sattbe'o nijara oparata te'omlokaka agraadhikara diye. Prakrtate yisakalaka antarara krpanatara paraa raksa karaa haiche, te'omloke'i saphalyamandita
